title: The Gold bug
creator_credit: Robert Fuest, Doro Bachrach and Highgate Pictures
brief_description: An adaptation of Edgar Allan Poe’s story of a young boy on a supposedly deserted island who finds a gold bug and an old piece of paper containing a secret code. He then encounters a crazed old man and his mute servant who are searching for Captain Kidd’s buried treasure.
